description: Detects URP patterns and status codes that indicate a successful ProxyShell exploitation attack against Exchange servers Author: Florian Roth, Rich Warren. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Successful Exchange ProxyShell Attack
query: (url.original:*\/autodiscover.json* AND url.original:(*\/powershell* OR *\/mapi\/nspi* OR *\/EWS* OR *X\-Rps\-CAT*) AND http.response.status_code:("200" OR "301"))
